name: DISCO / DISCOMFORT
description:
DISCO/DISCOMFORT
is a short interactive story, dedicated to sociophobia.

this game is about dancers and watchers,
and also about the experience of being in public spaces.
the user is prompted to make a trip to the disco-bar
and to interact with its inhabitants.

CONTROLS:
W(ASD) + mouselook (LMB when it ask for click)
for full experience webcam is needed

2.0 version update:

-small fixes
-finally you can get drunk!
